transArray.content: The hotel is in a strategic location. The surrounding facilities are complete. The room decoration is also good. The hygiene is also very clean. The floors are cleaned very carefully. I am very satisfied. There is also a free self-service laundry room that you can use. The bedding is very comfortable to sleep on.
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
